email_text:
Subject: Important Notice Regarding Your Student Loans

Dear [Recipient],

We are reaching out to inform you of a new loan forgiveness program available to borrowers who have federal student loans. As a valued customer of the Department of Education, we want to make sure you are aware of this opportunity to potentially have your student loans forgiven.

Through this program, eligible borrowers may have a portion or all of their federal student loans forgiven based on certain criteria. This is a limited-time offer, so we encourage you to act quickly to see if you qualify for this incredible opportunity.

To find out if you are eligible for loan forgiveness, please click on the link below to fill out a short form and provide some basic information about your student loans:

[Phishing Link]

Please note that this offer is only available to borrowers who meet the specific requirements outlined in the program guidelines. We urge you to act now to take advantage of this opportunity and potentially have your student loans forgiven.

Thank you for your attention to this important matter. We look forward to helping you navigate the loan forgiveness process and provide relief from your student loan debt.

Sincerely,

The Department of Education
